subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
Decisions and Verdicts
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Pacman Jones plans to appeal his year-long suspension by citing other players who have been involved in off-the-field misconduct and received lesser penalties by the N.F.L.
snippet: Pacman Jones plans to appeal his year-long suspension by citing other players who have been involved in off-the-field misconduct and received lesser penalties by the N.F.L.
